src:
Apa Kabar Rencana Jasa Marga Gandeng China Bangun Tol Probowangi?
05 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Herdi Alif Al Hikam


Foto: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - Dalam pembangunan tol Probolinggo-Banyuwangi (Probowangi), Jasa Marga melakukan kerja sama dengan pihak China Communication Construction Indonesia (CCCI) di Indonesia. Kedua belah pihak akan melakukan patungan untuk dana pembangunan jalan tol.Direktur Keuangan Jasa Marga Donny Arsal menyatakan kerja sama tersebut masih berjalan, kini menurutnya pihak China sedang melakukan due dilligence alias studi banding. Hal itu dilakukan untuk menentukan berapa banyak investasi yang akan dikeluarkan CCCI."Sekarang mereka lagi due diligences, baru mulai minggu lalu. Jadi kami masih nunggu proposal mereka, mereka mau kasih berapa belum ada angkanya," ujar Donny di Hotel Mulia, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019).Karena nantinya kedua belah pihak akan patungan modal, maka kepemilikan konsesi pun menjadi salah satu yang dipermasalahkan. Donny menegaskan, pihaknya akan tetap mempertahankan mayoritas kepemilikan tol Probowangi."Kita open divestasi memang, tapi akan tetap hold majority 51%," ucap Donny.Sebelumnya, kerja sama pembiayaan proyek dilakukan Jasa Marga dengan CCCI lewat organisasi Pembiayaan Investasi Non Anggaran Pemerintah (PINA) yang berada di bawah koordinasi Kementerian PPN/Bappenas. Nantinya akan ada Rp 23,3 triliun dana patungan dari CCCI dan Jasa Marga untuk membangun tol Probowangi. Simak Video "Antisipasi Macet, Rest Area Cikampek Arah Jakarta Akan Dibuka-tutup"[Gambas:Video 20detik](dna/dna)
text:
How are Jasa Marga's Plans in Collaboration with China to Build Probowangi Toll Road?
05 Nov 2019, 3:00 PM by Herdi Alif Al Hikam


Photo: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - In the development of the Probolinggo-Banyuwangi (Probowangi) toll road, Jasa Marga cooperates with the China Communication Construction Indonesia (CCCI) in Indonesia. The two sides will jointly fund the toll road construction. Jasa Marga Financial Director Donny Arsal said the cooperation is still ongoing, now according to him the Chinese side is conducting a due diligence alias comparative study. This is done to determine how much investment will be issued by CCCI. "Now they are due due diligences, only starting last week. So we are still waiting for their proposals, they want to give them how many there are no figures yet," Donny said at Hotel Mulia, Jakarta, Tuesday (5/11/2019). Because both parties will joint venture capital, the ownership of the concession will be the one at issue. Donny emphasized that his party would continue to maintain the majority ownership of Probowangi toll road. "We are indeed open divested, but we will still hold a majority of 51%," Donny said. ) which is under the coordination of the Ministry of PPN / Bappenas. In the future there will be Rp 23.3 trillion of joint funding from CCCI and Jasa Marga to build the Probowangi toll road. Watch Video "Anticipating Traffic, Cikampek Rest Area Directions Jakarta Will Be Opened" [Gambas: Video 20second] (dna / dna)
